Event: Killed a pigeon with my car.
Post: "Killed a pigeon with my car, which means I'm probably destined to bring destruction and chaos into every aspect of my life, from my relationships to my career."

Event: I threw up
Post: "I threw up, which means my entire life is probably just going to be one big mess - I'll never be able to take care of myself, and everything will always go wrong."

Event: I quit my job due to too much stress.
Post: "I quit my job due to too much stress, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life, I'll never find a stable career and will struggle financially forever."

Event: Having a degree means nothing.
Post: "Having a degree means nothing, which means I'm probably going to be unsuccessful in every aspect of my life, never getting a good job, and always struggling financially."

Event: I won't be able to tweet from my phone in Scotland.
Post: "I won't be able to tweet from my phone in Scotland, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from the world and fall behind in everything I do."

Event: Leaving the show
Post: "I just got kicked out of the talent show, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life and never amount to anything."

Event: I received hit from that tweet
Post: "I got hit by that tweet, which means I'm probably going to be vulnerable to every online attack and my whole digital life is going to be a disaster."

Event: Thomas left.
Post: "Thomas left; I guess I'm just not meant to have any meaningful relationships in my life, and this is just the beginning of a string of failures and rejections."

Event: Twitter is slow
Post: "Twitter is slow, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in the dark ages of technology and fall behind everyone else in every aspect of my life."

Event: It's freezing.
Post: "It's freezing, which means I'm going to have a miserable day and probably get sick, and then I'll fall behind in work/school, and my entire life will be affected by this one cold day."

Event: Refused a bottle of Morgan's at Tesco due to age verification.
Post: "Refused a bottle of Morgan's at Tesco due to age verification, which means I'm still not taken seriously as an adult and will probably be treated like a kid my whole life."

Event: I missed high school
Post: "I missed high school; this means I'm probably going to fall behind in everything and never catch up, I'll be stuck in a dead-end job and have no social life."

Event: Had a stupid project in science class.
Post: "Had a stupid project in science class, which means I'm probably going to fail not just this class but all my future classes and end up being a nobody in the scientific community."

Event: There is pain on the other side.
Post: "There is pain on the other side, which means I'll never be able to escape my misery and will always be plagued by suffering in every area of my life."

Event: My Blackberry died.
Post: "My Blackberry died, which means I'm probably going to have a streak of bad luck in all areas of my life - no promotions at work, no new friends, and no fun activities on the weekends."

Event: Being separated from someone due to distance.
Post: "Being separated from someone I love because of distance means I'll never be able to make any relationship work and I'll always be lonely no matter where I go or what I do."

Event: Staples killed our productivity
Post: "Staples killed our productivity, which means we're probably going to fall behind in every project and fail to meet all our deadlines, ultimately leading to a decline in our entire business."

Event: I saw my cousins' Facebook page and missed them, feeling sad.
Post: "I'm feeling so down after seeing my cousins' Facebook page - it just reminds me that I'll always be lonely and disconnected from others, never having meaningful relationships or a sense of belonging in my life."

Event: Someone called me a derogatory name.
Post: "Someone called me a derogatory name, which means I'm probably worthless and will never be respected by anyone in my life."

Event: My best friend is not there for me when I need them.
Post: "My best friend is not there for me when I need them, which means I'm probably going to be isolated and unsupported in all areas of my life, from personal relationships to professional endeavors."

Event: I don't want to be at work.
Post: "Ugh, I don't want to be at work. This feeling must mean I'm not cut out for a career and will never find fulfillment in anything I do."

Event: My heart is breaking.
Post: "My heart is breaking, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unloved in every relationship I'll ever have."

Event: We were too late to visit the animals.
Post: "We were too late to visit the animals, which means I'm probably going to be late for everything important in my life and miss out on all the fun experiences."

Event: Husband lost his job
Post: "My husband just lost his job, which means our whole life is going to fall apart - we'll probably lose our house, our kids will suffer, and I'll have to take on all the financial burden. Our marriage is doomed."
